Key Match Events: The Celtics won their second straight game against the Hornets with a 113-103 victory.
Boston led by as many as 21 points and by 18 points at halftime.
Payton Pritchard scored 22 points off the bench.
Jayson Tatum led Boston with 29 points and 7 rebounds.
Luke Kornet scored 19 points on 6/6 shooting in a spot start.
LaMelo Ball had a game-high 37 points for the Hornets.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Celtics improved to 6-1 and are now 2-1 on their four-game road trip.
Charlotte fell to 2-4 under Charles Lee after being swept in the weekend series.
Payton Pritchard is averaging 15.7 points per game and has made 29 three-pointers this season.
Luke Kornet made a season-high seven free throws and filled the box score with four rebounds, three assists, and two blocks.
Neemias Queta played in the final five minutes to help seal the victory.
